# Task

You prepare a __proposal for your master's thesis__, thereby going through __a complete process of writing and publishing an academic paper__ (topic, strategy, narrative, review, revision, presentation).

. . .

You need to apply what you have leanred and create __multiple deliverables__. The deliverables are usually created during a writing and publication cycle. In addition, you get feedback from both, your peer students as well as the Professors.

. . .

The deliverables reflect your learning progress and are graded individually.


# Deliverables

- Proposal for the master thesis
- Review of a fellow student's proposal
- Revision of the proposal incl.  response letter
- Presentation (defense) of the proposal
- Topic (6 mins)
Lessons learned (2 mins)
